thread.title: How the Dow Jones industrial average fared on Wednesday
thread.title_full: How the Dow Jones industrial average fared on Wednesday

title: How the Dow Jones industrial average fared on Wednesday
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Wed, Aug 19, 2015, 22:00 BST - UK Markets closed How the Dow Jones industrial average fared on Wednesday How the Dow Jones industrial average and other major indexes fared on Wednesday By The Associated Press | Associated Press – 13 minutes ago 
U.S. stocks closed lower on Wednesday as investors got mixed signals from the Federal Reserve over the possibility of an interest rate hike in September. Energy stocks fell as the price of oil plummeted. 
For the day: 
The Dow Jones industrial average fell 162.61 points, or 0.9 percent, to 17,348.73. 
The Standard & Poor's 500 index lost 17.31 points, or 0.8 percent, to 2,079.61. 
The Nasdaq composite dropped 40.30 points, or 0.8 percent, to 5,019.05. 
For the week: 
The Dow is down 128.67 points, or 0.7 percent. 
The S&P 500 index is down 11.93 points, or 0.6 percent. 
The Nasdaq is down 29.18 points, or 0.6 percent. 
For the year: 
The Dow is down 474.34 points, or 2.7 percent. 
The S&P 500 index is up 20.71 points, or 1 percent. 
The Nasdaq is up 283.00 points, or 6 percent. Follow the quotes you care about most. Access timely news and investment updates to stay on top of the market. … More » Yahoo UK & Ireland Finance Terms
